item.title: VST
item.description: score:104 Chances: Vistra Corp. (VST) has announced a 9% increase in its quarterly common stock dividend per share compared to the previous year. Vistra Corp. (VST) is well positioned to outperform the market, exhibiting above-average growth in financials. The company has received approval from the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) to acquire Energy Harbor, adding significant assets to its portfolio.
